content:
wasmtime is awesome & very useful in our project. you guys rock :)
off topic in my off topic : avx512 support for maximum simd would be nice. goes beyond the standard :)

just about maybe hit 1.0 for our 3d web browser. the assemblyscript stuff will allow regular webdevs to migrate over into as close a development experience as they're used to as possible so that was worth doing.
happy to add credits or license file or whatever's needed. and hopefully contribute some more at some point.
Steve Williams has marked this topic as resolved.
